title: FYP #32 When to Walk Away from Toxic People with Gary Thomas
description:
We can’t talk about finding your people without talking about when to walk away from toxic people. Gary Thomas shares what to do when faced with relationships that are unhealthy and keeping us from doing what God has called us to.

Find Gary Thomas’ new book When to Walk Away: Finding Freedom from Toxic People here: https://www.amazon.com/dp/0310346762

Download the book club guide PDF here: jennieallen.com

Get your copy of Find Your People: findyourpeoplebook.com

Become one of our texties by texting the word PODCAST to 214-225-6267
